reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. WHITSON v. STATE, 521 So.2d 1143 (La. 1988)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. RICHARD E. WHITSON v. STATE OF LOUISIANA.

opinion.posture: In re Whitson, Richard; applying for supervisory and/or remedial writs; Parish of Caddo, 1st Judicial District Court, Div. "C".
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted for sole purpose of transferring to 19th Judicial District Court.
